ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But when the eyesight is dazzled,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Yet when the eyes are dazzled,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when the eyes will be blinded by light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when the sight becomes dazed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But when the sight is dazed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But [on that Day], when mortal sight is confounded,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When, then, the sight shall be confounded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But when the eyes are dazzled,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: At length, when the sight is dazed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So, when the sight shall be dazed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: but when the sight is dazed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [75:7] But when the eyes are dazzled (read bariqa or baraqa), startled and perplexed upon seeing some of those things which it used to deny;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah said to him: (But when sight is confounded) and it is also said this means: when sight is pleased
